short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to set a timer on Youtube's Autoplay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you fall asleep to Youtube videos on autoplay and wake up to still find Youtube videos playing? This extension will allow you to set a timer on the autoplay toggle so videos will stop auto playing
